Name: Judgment Blade- Scythe Long Blade
Description: Close-range weapon, the scythe long blade focuses on a single slash, instantly cutting down the enemy, while the scythe pursues multiple consecutive strikes, wielding blade light, alternating use, showcasing unique combat skills.
Description$english: Close-range weapon, the scythe long blade focuses on a single slash, instantly cutting down the enemy, while the scythe pursues multiple consecutive strikes, wielding blade light, alternating use, showcasing unique combat skills.
